page.title: 10THE ANSTEY GALA.
page.content:
In August there is nearly always a { {Gala}. It starts off with a big parade. In it are 3 bands all wearing different costumes. There are a lot of floats and near the very back of the parade in a green truck there is {The {Anstey Gala Queen}with her 2 attendants. She sits on a throne and above her she has a decorated hoop. The paradegoes all the way round Anstey and back to the recreation ground. There are stslls and sometimes there is an open top mini_bus. If the weather is really nice the gala has a bouncy castle and a Tug_of_War competition. Everyone has a great time.
By Cara Ingelsant Aged 11
